page.title: 13Disadvantages, Brickhill
page.content:
These disadvantages were stated in the survey of 200 families:-
{Too far from sea.................7 { Not enough amenities............10 { Expensive property...............2 { Expensive 'bus service...........7 { Noise from wind tunnel...........8 { Not a multi-ethnic area..........1 { Walks confined to footpaths......1 { Burglaries in the area...........3 { Heavy clay soil..................2 { Costly rates.....................1 { No dentist/surgery in area.......5 { No fast food outlets in area.....5 { Sports complex too far away......1 { No local theatre.................1 { Lack of nursery education........3 { Large classes in primary schools.3 { Poor T.V. & radio reception......1 { Overhead power cables............1 {
